Topic.Title: How do I get my game so everybody can see it?

Posts.EditableText:

Oh, and here's the link, feel free to look at it... I'm not finished, there will be updates:http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/nahxy4azx0alzhzeuqfhdg/the-darkness
